mapper.sql: `id` AS `id`, `user_id` AS `userId`, `currency_trade_id` AS `currencyTradeId`, `price` AS `price`, `amount` AS `amount`, `success_amount` AS `successAmount`, `count` AS `count`, `left_count` AS `leftCount`, `fees` AS `fees`, `left_fees` AS `leftFees`, `status` AS `status`, `entrust_type` AS `entrustType`, `entrust_direction` AS `entrustDirection`, `version` AS `version`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`
